name: Sushi Moriawase
description: An assortment of fresh, vinegared rice topped with various ingredients, mainly raw fish and seafood.

name: Tonkotsu Ramen
description: Rich and savory noodle soup with a pork bone broth, topped with chashu pork, menma, and a soft-boiled egg.

name: Ebi Tempura
description: Lightly battered and deep-fried prawns, served with a tentsuyu dipping sauce.

name: Chicken Karaage
description: Juicy, bite-sized pieces of marinated chicken, fried to a perfect crisp.

name: Okonomiyaki
description: A savory Japanese pancake containing a variety of ingredients, topped with sauces and bonito flakes.

name: Tofu Miso Soup
description: A traditional Japanese soup made with dashi stock, miso paste, tofu, and wakame seaweed.

name: Yakitori Platter
description: Skewered and grilled chicken, seasoned with either a sweet soy-based tare sauce or salt.

name: Salmon Onigiri
description: A classic Japanese rice ball filled with grilled salmon and wrapped in nori seaweed.

name: Kitsune Udon
description: Thick wheat flour noodles in a savory hot broth, topped with seasoned fried tofu.

name: Zaru Soba
description: Chilled buckwheat noodles served with a soy-based tsuyu dipping sauce, nori, and wasabi.

name: Tonkatsu Set
description: A breaded, deep-fried pork cutlet served with rice, miso soup, and shredded cabbage.

name: Gyoza
description: Pan-fried dumplings filled with ground meat and vegetables, served with a dipping sauce.

name: Katsudon
description: A comforting bowl of rice topped with a deep-fried pork cutlet, egg, and condiments.

name: Takoyaki
description: Ball-shaped Japanese snack made of a wheat flour-based batter and filled with diced octopus.

name: Sashimi Platter
description: A selection of expertly sliced, fresh raw fish and seafood, served with daikon, wasabi, and soy sauce.

name: Beef Sukiyaki
description: Thinly sliced beef simmered in a sweet and savory soy sauce broth with vegetables and tofu in a hot pot.

name: Pork Shabu-Shabu
description: A hot pot dish of thinly sliced pork and vegetables boiled in water and served with dipping sauces.

name: Edamame
description: Young soybeans steamed in their pods and lightly salted. A perfect, healthy appetizer.

name: Chawanmushi
description: A savory and delicate Japanese steamed egg custard, filled with ingredients like chicken and mushrooms.

name: Matcha Mochi
description: Soft and chewy rice cake filled with a sweet red bean paste and flavored with green tea.

name: Chicken Teriyaki Don
description: A rice bowl (donburi) topped with grilled chicken glazed in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.

name: Unagi Kabayaki
description: Grilled freshwater eel glazed with a sweetened soy-based kabayaki sauce.

name: Nikujaga
description: A classic Japanese home-cooked dish of stewed meat (niku) and potatoes (jagaimo).

name: Yakisoba
description: Japanese stir-fried noodles with pork and vegetables, seasoned with a sweet and savory sauce.

name: Matcha Roll Cake
description: A light and fluffy sponge cake rolled with a creamy matcha-flavored filling.
